attributes.action: Call on Patricia Hewitt to resign for assisting in the further ruination of the NHS at patients and doctors expense
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We call for her removal - and that of her senior advisers - as a result her and the entire departments' abject and multiple failures while at the helm of the NHS: 
1) Junior Doctors training scandal, 
2)NHS GPs' new costly contracts for reduced work.
3) Growing patient dissatisfaction and lack of care available i.e. canceled operations
4) Hospital & Health Trust fiscal failures leading to reduced patient care.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
